Using the [[Sasori (puppet)|Sasori]] [[puppet]], Kankurō detaches its head and launches several triangular blades with explosive balls attached to them from the neck and palms of the puppet.

== Trivia ==
* The {{translation|"machinery"|機々|kiki}} part of the name comes from Kankurō's [[Black Secret Technique Machine One Shot]].
